summary: Provides utilities for serializing and deserializing Python source files using abstract syntax tree manipulation, including dumping data structures to Python code, loading them back, and applying inâ€‘place updates while handling syntax errors and file corruption.
business_intent: Allow applications to persist configuration or other data as native Python files, enabling easy editing, version control, and programmatic updates without relying on external formats, while ensuring robustness against malformed or corrupted files.
